direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve modifying the attributes of an element, but clearAttributes removes all attributes while removeAttr removes a specific attribute.
Both methods interact with the attributes of an element, but attr sets or updates a specific attribute while clearAttributes removes all attributes.
The clearAttributes method directly interacts with the attributes() method to access and clear the attributes of an element.
The clearAttributes method may check if the element has attributes using hasAttributes() before clearing them.
Both methods access and manipulate the attributes of an element, with dataset() specifically targeting data attributes.
Both methods modify the attributes of an element, with addClass adding a class attribute while clearAttributes removes all attributes.
Both methods modify the attributes of an element, with removeClass removing a specific class attribute while clearAttributes removes all attributes.
Both methods modify the attributes of an element, with toggleClass toggling a class attribute while clearAttributes removes all attributes.
Both methods interact with the attributes of an element, with id setting the id attribute while clearAttributes removes all attributes.
Both methods interact with the attributes of an element, with val setting the value attribute while clearAttributes removes all attributes.
